description_txt: stated on March 16, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: The government is closing businesses to stop the spread of coronavirus even though "the numbers are nothing compared to H1N1 or Ebola. Everyone needs to realize our government is up to something ...”

description_txt: stated on March 25, 2020 in a flier:
quote_txt: Says Deputy Comptroller Aycha Sawa "blocked an audit" of the Milwaukee lead program for three years that "put our children in danger" and spurred a criminal investigation.

description_txt: stated on April 3, 2020 in a blog post:
quote_txt: “Joe Exotic tests positive for coronavirus in prison. It’s been confirmed.”

description_txt: stated on March 28, 2020 in a post:
quote_txt: Says a “5G LAW PASSED while everyone was distracted” with the coronavirus pandemic and lists 20 symptoms associated with 5G exposure.

description_txt: stated on March 28, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says for otherwise healthy people “experiencing mild to moderate respiratory symptoms with or without a COVID-19 diagnosis … only high temperatures kill a virus, so let your fever run high,” but not over 103 or 104 degrees.

description_txt: stated on March 28, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Pictures and reports of “empty hospitals” prove COVID-19 spread is “fake crisis for real government planned agendas.”

description_txt: stated on March 27, 2020 in a virtual town hall on CNN:
quote_txt: “There was no effort” to get American experts into China after it announced the coronavirus, and “we had one person in-country (and Trump) pulled him out of the country.”

description_txt: stated on March 30, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Nancy Pelosi’s “daughter is on the board of the Kennedy Center so that’s why it was so important to send them all that money.”

description_txt: stated on March 22, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “In Chicago, Covid-19 actually LOWERED the death rate.”

description_txt: stated on March 23, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “This lady here applied sanitizer to her hands/forearms & went to the kitchen to cook. The moment she turned on the gas stove, her hands caught fire due to the alcohol contained in the sanitizer.”

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in comments made during an episode of "The Five" on the Fox News Channel:
quote_txt: “We were slow with the testing, but very quick with the travel ban. And that's been much more critical in saving lives.”

description_txt: stated on March 16, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says the U.S. is developing an “antivirus” that includes a chip to track your movement.

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in a briefing:
quote_txt: Says for the coronavirus, “the death rate in Texas, per capita of 29 million people, we're one of the lowest in the country."

description_txt: stated on March 3, 2020 in campaign email:
quote_txt: Says rival Jill Karofsky wants "to disarm law abiding citizens."

description_txt: stated on March 29, 2020 in an image:
quote_txt: Says the governors of Michigan, New York and Nevada “have issued orders banning the prescription of hydroxychloroquine to patients with COVID-19.”

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in a blog post:
quote_txt: Says Italy arrested a doctor “for intentionally killing over 3,000 coronavirus patients.”

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “On February 7, the WHO warned about the limited stock of PPE. That same day, the Trump administration announced it was sending 18 tons of masks, gowns and respirators to China.”

description_txt: stated on March 28, 2020 in a blog post:
quote_txt: “Queen Elizabeth tests positive for COVID-19.”

description_txt: stated on March 28, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says COVID-19 remains in the air for eight hours and that everyone is now required to wear masks “everywhere.”

description_txt: stated on March 25, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “if your child gets this virus their going to hospital alone in a van with people they don’t know...to be with people they don’t know… you will be at home without them in their time of need.”

description_txt: stated on March 27, 2020 in a television interview:
quote_txt: “They’re furloughing nurses in hospitals in western New York state.”

description_txt: stated on March 24, 2020 in a false news article:
quote_txt: Says President Donald Trump will announce that a scientist "finally found vaccine to cure corona virus."

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Ron Johnson said Americans should go back to work, because "death is an unavoidable part of life."

description_txt: stated on March 19, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says North Carolina "hospital beds are typically 85% full across the state.”

description_txt: stated on March 3, 2020 in a radio interview.:
quote_txt: “Even Fairfax County doesn’t pay the kind of (school administration) salaries that Richmond is paying right now.”

description_txt: stated on March 22, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, “We have lost control, we have killed the epidemic physically and mentally. Can’t understand what more we can do, all solutions are exhausted on ground. Our only hope remains up in the Sky, God rescue your people.”

description_txt: stated on March 23, 2020 in comments he made on the radio:
quote_txt: “We’ve got to give the American public a rough estimate of how long we think this is going to take, based mostly on the South Korean model, which seems to be the trajectory that we are on, thankfully, and not the Italian model.”

description_txt: stated on March 28, 2020 in a video on Twitter:
quote_txt: “My mask will keep someone else safe and their mask will keep me safe.”

description_txt: stated on March 27, 2020 in social media:
quote_txt: Shows a waitress saying, "I lost my job. But I'll sleep better knowing” that the coronavirus relief bill included funding for the Kennedy Center, refugee resettlement, PBS, and congressional salaries: “Thanks, Democrats”

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says students have to repeat the same grade next year.
